briefTitle: Phase III B in Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia
officialTitle: Phase IIIb Study for Relapsed/Refractory Pediatric/Young Adult Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia Patients to be Treated With CTL019
summary: This is a single arm, open-label, multi-center, phase III B study to determine the safety and efficacy of CTL019 in pediatric/young adult patients with r/r B-cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (ALL).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From CTL019 infusion until end of study, up to 12 months
